about_the_game:
STEEL HEART is a first-person horror mech game where you have to manage the mech's resources and fend off and survive the dangers that lie on the alien planet that constantly rains steel...

THE MECH

In the mech, you have to craft shells to load and fire, craft light sources, and maneuver the mech to face entities. You are also in charge with logging entities.
If your mechs energy shield takes enough damage the mech will need to reboot, and you are thrust outside with nothing but your pistol, and your will to survive.

THE PLANET

The planet you land on is unforgiving. It is perpetually dark. It continuously rains steel. You are always not alone.

THE PROMISE OF FREEDOM

Your mission is to find out if the planet is habitable for humanity, by logging all entities you encounter. Do this, and you are promised freedom...

OTHER

The game has 3 endings, and the game is also relatively short. Try to get them all.
The game also has difficult STEEL MODE, to play STEEL MODE click on the title during the main menu.
